title: Alias {!lucene} as {!solr} because that's what it really is
description: I think it's silly to have Solr's query parser be referenced via {!lucene} to LuceneQParser.  We can keep {!lucene} as-such for back-compat forever but we ought to use {!solr} and rename LuceneQParser to be SolrQParser.  And the documentation ought to forgo "standard query parser" and simply say the "Solr query parser".
